name: Bandha Kopi
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.

ingredients.name: Ginger
ingredients.quantity: 1 inch ground to a fine paste

ingredients.name: Green Chillie
ingredients.quantity: 5 nos. ground to a fine paste

steps: Wash and clean the shredded Cabbage.
Pressure cook the Cabbage till the cooker whistles once.
Open the cooker, drain the excess water and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add the Bay leaves.
Add the potato and stirfry till golden brown.
Add Ginger paste, Green Chillie paste, Turmeric powder, tomato and stirfry for 2 minutes.
Add the Cabbage and stirfry for 5 minutes.
Add 1 cup water, Sugar to the mixture.
Reduce flame and stirfry for 5 minutes.
Add Ghee and Garam Masala to the mixture and stirfry till the mixture is dry in nature.
Spread the coarsely ground fried Masala Bori on the Curry and serve.
